tool.name: OPTICS
tool.description: Opsin Phenotype Tool for Inference of Color Sensitivity

param.name: blast_checkbox
param.label: Enable for BLASTp analysis against corresponding model dataset
param.help: Enables or disables BLASTp analysis of query sequences against VPOD datasets

tool.help:
This tool predicts Opsin Phenotype (Î»max) from an input file of opsin amino-acid sequences in FASTA format.
Output 1 = A *.tsv* file of predictions matched to corresponding sequence 'name' take from the FASTA identifier.
Output 2 (if enabled) = A *.txt* file of each query sequence BLASTed against the corresponding model dataset to find sequence with closest %identity and find highlight sites that differ.
*WARNING - If your file is not in proper FASTA format, this tool will not work properly!*
Example of properly formatted FASTA entry:
>NP_001014890.1_rhodopsin_Bos taurus
